title: API Key
description: The JSON sub-schema for API key object

creator_id.title: Creator ID
creator_id.description: Unique 32-char ID of an API key creator

owner_id.title: Owner ID
owner_id.description: Unique 32-char ID of the API key owner

api_key_id.title: API Key ID
api_key_id.description: Unique 32-char ID for the API key

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: If true, the API key will be active

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: When the API key was created
